verses.esv: 10 Love one another with brotherly affection. Outdo one another in showing honor.
verses.kjv: 10 Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;
verses.niv: 10 Be devoted to one another in brotherly love. Honor one another above yourselves.

verses.esv: 11 Therefore encourage one another and build one another up, just as you are doing.
verses.kjv: 11 Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
verses.niv: 11 Therefore encourage one another and build each other up, just as in fact you are doing.

verses.esv: 34 A new commandment I give to you, that you love one another: just as I have loved you, you also are to love one another.
verses.kjv: 34 A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.
verses.niv: 34 "A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.

verses.esv: 32 Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.
verses.kjv: 32 And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ’s sake hath forgiven you.
verses.niv: 32 Be kind and compassionate to one another, forgiving each other, just as in Christ God forgave you.

verses.esv: 8 Above all, keep loving one another earnestly, since love covers a multitude of sins.
verses.kjv: 8 And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
verses.niv: 8 Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.

verses.esv: 2 with all humility and gentleness, with patience, bearing with one another in love,
verses.kjv: 2 With all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;
verses.niv: 2 Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love.

verses.esv: 8 Owe no one anything, except to love each other, for the one who loves another has fulfilled the law.
verses.kjv: 8 Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.
verses.niv: 8 Let no debt remain outstanding, except the continuing debt to love one another, for he who loves his fellowman has fulfilled the law.

verses.esv: 13 For you were called to freedom, brothers. Only do not use your freedom as an opportunity for the flesh, but through love serve one another.
verses.kjv: 13 For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
verses.niv: 13 You, my brothers, were called to be free. But do not use your freedom to indulge the sinful nature; rather, serve one another in love.

verses.esv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God.
verses.kjv: 7 Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
verses.niv: 7 Dear friends, let us love one another, for love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.

verses.esv: 11 For this is the message that you have heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.
verses.kjv: 11 For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.
verses.niv: 11 This is the message you heard from the beginning: We should love one another.

verses.esv: 3 Do nothing from selfish ambition or conceit, but in humility count others more significant than yourselves.
verses.kjv: 3 Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
verses.niv: 3 Do nothing out of selfish ambition or vain conceit, but in humility consider others better than yourselves.

verses.esv: 5 Likewise, you who are younger, be subject to the elders. Clothe yourselves, all of you, with humility toward one another, for “God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble.”
verses.kjv: 5 Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.
verses.niv: 5 Young men, in the same way be submissive to those who are older. All of you, clothe yourselves with humility toward one another, because, "God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble."

verses.esv: 16 Live in harmony with one another. Do not be haughty, but associate with the lowly. Never be wise in your own sight.
verses.kjv: 16 Be of the same mind one toward another. Mind not high things, but condescend to men of low estate. Be not wise in your own conceits.
verses.niv: 16 Live in harmony with one another. Do not be proud, but be willing to associate with people of low position. Do not be conceited.

verses.esv: 9 Show hospitality to one another without grumbling.
verses.kjv: 9 Use hospitality one to another without grudging.
verses.niv: 9 Offer hospitality to one another without grumbling.

verses.esv: 24 And let us consider how to stir up one another to love and good works,
verses.kjv: 24 And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works:
verses.niv: 24 And let us consider how we may spur one another on toward love and good deeds.

verses.esv: 11 Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.
verses.kjv: 11 Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
verses.niv: 11 Dear friends, since God so loved us, we also ought to love one another.

verses.esv: 21 submitting to one another out of reverence for Christ.
verses.kjv: 21 Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.
verses.niv: 21 Submit to one another out of reverence for Christ.

verses.esv: 12 “This is my commandment, that you love one another as I have loved you.
verses.kjv: 12 This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
verses.niv: 12 My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.

verses.esv: 16 Therefore, confess your sins to one another and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous person has great power as it is working.
verses.kjv: 16 Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
verses.niv: 16 Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.

verses.esv: 13 bearing with one another and, if one has a complaint against another, forgiving each other; as the Lord has forgiven you, so you also must forgive.
verses.kjv: 13 Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
verses.niv: 13 Bear with each other and forgive whatever grievances you may have against one another. Forgive as the Lord forgave you.

verses.esv: 22 Having purified your souls by your obedience to the truth for a sincere brotherly love, love one another earnestly from a pure heart,
verses.kjv: 22 Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently:
verses.niv: 22 Now that you have purified yourselves by obeying the truth so that you have sincere love for your brothers, love one another deeply, from the heart.

verses.esv: 9 Now concerning brotherly love you have no need for anyone to write to you, for you yourselves have been taught by God to love one another,
verses.kjv: 9 But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.
verses.niv: 9 Now about brotherly love we do not need to write to you, for you yourselves have been taught by God to love each other.

verses.esv: 2 Bear one another’s burdens, and so fulfill the law of Christ.
verses.kjv: 2 Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
verses.niv: 2 Carry each other's burdens, and in this way you will fulfill the law of Christ.

verses.esv: 13 But exhort one another every day, as long as it is called “today,” that none of you may be hardened by the deceitfulness of sin.
verses.kjv: 13 But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.
verses.niv: 13 But encourage one another daily, as long as it is called Today, so that none of you may be hardened by sin's deceitfulness.

verses.esv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly, teaching and admonishing one another in all wisdom, singing psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, with thankfulness in your hearts to God.
verses.kjv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
verses.niv: 16 Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly as you teach and admonish one another with all wisdom, and as you sing psalms, hymns and spiritual songs with gratitude in your hearts to God.
